dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2736694K] Abuse Report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2007 10:53 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2736694K] Abuse Report

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Subject: Abuse Report

designates 64.233.182.188 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.188;
envelope-from=eskick@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com;

FILETIME=[A9CE1660:01C74224] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hi Theplanet services,
We have a abuse complaint which references the IP address 70.87.72.19
which we believe belongs to you. Please be advised that a website hosted
on the ip address "http://www.upload-globe.com" Has been using our
"terms of service" and "faq" found on Our service: 
"http://www.uploadline.com" 
 
If this is your IP address, please reply to this email with an
explanation regarding your use of the. If you have not engaged in the
activity the email below implies or if this is not your IP address,
please let me know in a reply to this message. 
 
Failure to respond to this message in a timely manner will result in the
disabling of the ResNet connections in your room. Please respond
directly to this message; do not send a new message. 
 
Sincerely,
Emre Korkmaz
